snippet.title: Coridden - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
*Play* #Coridden ► https://bit.ly/Coridden_Steam
🎮 Check out all *Anshar Publishing games* ► https://bit.ly/Anshar_Games

🎯 00:00 - Intro
🔥 00:07 - An Action Adventure RPG
🦖 00:13 - Shapeshift
🤝 00:29 - Ride Together 
💪 00:40 - Grow Your Powers
💗 00:55 - Play Coridden! 

*Coridden is an action RPG* where you play as a monster-shifter, able to transform into the creatures you defeat. Venture out alone or in CO-OP with up to 3 friends on a journey to uncover the dark secrets sealed inside the legendary city of Aasha.

📰 *SOCIAL MEDIA*
Discord ► https://bit.ly/Anshar_Discord 
Twitter ► https://bit.ly/Coridden_Twitter
Coridden Website ► https://bit.ly/Coridden_Website
Our Website ► https://ansharpublishing.com

🔴 *Video Details:*
Become the beasts you defeat in this action-packed RPG! ► https://youtu.be/9E2WhAa72SQ?list=PL1qJ6onPYD3tr7xx1qniM9pk6BvZX6vVW

📌 *Tags:* #arpg #hackandslash #actionrpg
► #coop #pve #adventuregame
